title: Provided further that, FSI above the basic permissible 0
clause_text: Provided further that, FSI above the basic permissible 0.10 FSI up to 0.20 may be granted by the Authority / Collector on payment of premium at the rate of 20% of the land rate of the said land mentioned in the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) for the year in which such additional FSI is granted. Such premium shall be deposited in the office of the Authority / District Branch of the Town Planning Directorate.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
